text: The Canon EF 180/3.5L Macro USM lens is the longest macro lens made by Canon in the EF mount and is one of only two Canon macro lenses that are part of the L series. This lens is compatible with the Canon Extender EF teleconverters. == External links == * * digital-picture.com * Fred Miranda review * photo.net Canon EF 180mm f/3.5L Macro USM lens Category:Canon EF lenses
title: Canon EF 180mm f/3.5L Macro USM lens
